Text: Form of Cadwalader Opinion for EnronNYPA Agreementsee attached from Susan Lobel Forwarded by Jo MurphyNYCWT on AM Jo Murphy To cc PM Subject Form of Cadwalader Opinion for EnronNYPA Agreement Attached is a draft of the enforceability opinion to be delivered on behalf of Enron in connection with the Swap Agreement with NYPA Please note that this draft is subject to review by our opinion committee Please call Susan Lobel at with any questions or comments See attached file v Enron Opiniondoc v Enron Opiniondoc
